attributes.action: Create an 'opt-out' transplant list for potential organ donors
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned petition the government to change the law to allow for an opt-out organ transplant list, replacing the current 'opt-in' system.

Every day, 3 people in the UK die waiting for a transplant. They die because far more people are willing to accept a transplant than to donate themselves, and to make the choice to join the Organ Donation Register.

Under an opt-out system, those who have an objection to donating will be able to say as such- allowing those who don't mind, but haven't got round to joining the organ donation register, to donate their organs.

Needless deaths can be so easily prevented.
